definition: to describe sth as/an analogy/a simile/a metaphor/an allegory

sentences.english: Sometimes thinks the fear, one kind cannot be explained but sense of being lost and lonely surprise attack to.
sentences.chinese: 有時覺得害怕，一種不可言喻的失落感突襲而至。

sentences.english: In silent prayers, I pray what words could never say.
sentences.chinese: 我默默地祈禱，訴說着那些難以言喻的情感。

sentences.english: Marketing industry and I have a mysterious ineffable charm.
sentences.chinese: 銷售行業與我，有着不可言喻的神祕魅力。

sentences.english: There's no words to express the way you made me feel .
sentences.chinese: 我對妳的感覺是那樣難以言喻。

sentences.english: The exquisite joy and the unspeakable grief of this relationship have grown me in ways I could never have anticipated.
sentences.chinese: 無法預料的極樂和無法言喻的悲傷使我成長。

sentences.english: Thefeeling of regain treasure is inexpressible.
sentences.chinese: 重獲珍寶的感受是難以言喻的。

sentences.english: Music brings me into a different world. The feeling is beyond words.
sentences.chinese: 音樂帶我進入了另一個世界，這種感覺難以言喻。

sentences.english: As to shopping environment and convenient service, they are unmentionable.
sentences.chinese: 至於購物環境和方便的服務，他們是無法言喻的。

sentences.english: Untranslatable into words, I chose my home in what is now.
sentences.chinese: 無法言喻，我從“當下”裏選擇我的家。

definition: in the extreme (idiom)/incapable of further increase
